existing_features.title: Update the wheel SVG label positioning so that all segment texts (TIGER / DRAGON / MISS / CRIT and their multipliers) appear clearly centered inside their respective wheel wedges (not sitting on/overlapping the segment borders/dividing lines) across responsive sizes.

Ensure the wheel pointer is positioned at the exact top-middle (12 o’clock), horizontally centered over the wheel, and remains centered even while its animation runs (i.e., do not allow CSS animations to override the centering transform).

Remove the grey border/background from the pointer graphic so only the yellow pointer (with glow) remains on a transparent background, and update the app to use the cleaned asset for the wheel pointer.
Change the pointer animation from left-right/scale pulsing to a repeating up-down motion (up, down, up, down), while preserving the pointer’s 12 o’clock centered position.
